Killer Tomato

This contains Java and SQL two versions

  • SQL version Using Oracle SDO_GEOM package to draw a picture Killer Tomato
    My oracle port: 1522 (default port is 1521)
    Database user: kai
    Database password: apple
  • JAVA version Make a connection with Database using JDBC4j and get the data from Database;
    Translate these SQL commands into JAVA codes;
    Interact with Database by sending SQL commands to Oracle;

Relate Function using “Contain” to be MASK parameter;

Source code and details
